headers.subject: [tosdr:2145] [Bad] BitTorrent may disclose personally identifiable information in the event of a transfer or sale

html:
Emphasis mine

BitTorrent does not currently sell, trade, or otherwise transfer outside the company personally identifiable information that visitors voluntarily provide in any registration or use of the BitTorrent websites or the BitTorrent Client.
...we may disclose your personally identifiable information upon a transfer or sale to another entity of all or substantially all of our assets or equity securities or upon any other corporate reorganization.

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
---

subject: [Bad] BitTorrent may disclose personally identifiable information in the event of a transfer or sale
text:
Emphasis mine

BitTorrent does not *currently* sell, trade, or otherwise transfer outside 
the company personally identifiable information that visitors voluntarily 
provide in any registration or use of the BitTorrent websites or the 
BitTorrent Client.
...we may disclose your personally identifiable information upon a transfer 
or sale to another entity of all or substantially all of our assets or 
equity securities or upon any other corporate reorganization.

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
